title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 14
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 14:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Agee - Inside the Company; CIA Diary, 2e (1975)

-  Bagaric & Clarke - Torture; When the Unthinkable Is Morally Permissible (2007)

-  Baker - Family of Secrets; Bush Dynasty, America's Invisible Government, and the Hidden History of the Last Fifty Years (2009)

-  Balko - Rise of the Warrior Cop; the Militarization of America's Police Forces (2013)

-  Bamford - The Puzzle Palace; Inside the National Security Agency; America's Most Secret Intelligence Organization (1983)

-  Bamford - The Shadow Factory, The Ultra-Secret NSA from 9-11 to the Eavesdropping on America (2008)

-  Betts - Enemies of Intelligence; Knowledge and Power in American National Security (2007)

-  Black - War Against the Weak; Eugenics and America's Campaign to Create a Master Race, 2e (2012)

-  Boghosian - Spying on Democracy; Government Surveillance, Corporate Power, and Public Resistance (2013)

-  Chomsky - Power Systems (2013)

-  Chomsky & Vltchek - On Western Terrorism from Hiroshima to Drone Warfare (2013)

-  Enders - Baghdad Bulletin; Dispatches on the American Occupation (2005)

-  Finn - America at War; Concise Histories of U.S. Military Conflicts form Lexington to Afghanistan (2014)

-  Goodall - A Need to Know; the Clandestine History of a CIA Family (2006)

-  Goodell & Hearn - Shade It Black; Death and After in Iraq (2011)

-  Gregory - The Power of Habeas Corpus in America; from the King's Prerogative to the War on Terror (2013)

-  Harding - The Snowden Files; the Inside Story of the World's Most Wanted Man (2014)

-  Kennard - Irregular Army; How the US Military Recruited Neo-Nazis, Gang Members, and Criminals to Fight the War on Terror (2012)

-  Khalidi - Brokers of Deceit; How the U.S. Had Undermined Peace in the Middle East (2013)

-  Khalidi - Sowing Crisis; the Cold War and American Dominance in the Middle East (2009)

-  Kolko - Another Century of War (2002)

-  Lance - Deal with the Devil; the FBI's Secret Thirty-Year Relationship with a Mafia Killer (2013)

-  Lindauer - Extreme Prejudice; the Terrifying Story of the Patriot Act and the Cover Ups of 9-11 and Iraq (2010)

-  McMaster - Dereliction of Duty; Lyndon Johnson, Robert McNamara, the Joint Chiefs of Staff, and the Lies That Led to Vietnam (1997)

-  Medsger - The Burglary; the Discovery of J. Edgar Hoover's Secret FBI (2014)

-  Napolitano - Lies the Government Told You; Myth, Power, and Deception in American History (2010)

-  NSA Secrets; Government Spying in the Internet Age (The Washington Post, 2013)

-  Peikoff - The Ominous Parallels; the End of Freedoms in America (1982)

-  Pintak - Seeds of Hate; How America's Flawed Middle East Policy Ignited the Jihad (2003)

-  Prados - The Family Jewels; the CIA, Secrecy, and Presidential Power (2013)

-  Robinson - A Tragedy of Democracy; Japanese Confinement in North America (2009)

-  Ross - Hiroshima; a Place in History (2010)

-  Rust - Before the Quagmire; American Intervention in Laos, 1954-1961 (2012)

-  Tirman - The Deaths of Others; the Fate of Civilians in America's Wars (2011)

-  Turse - The Changing Face of Empire; Special Ops, Drones, Spies, Proxy Fighters, Secret Bases, and Cyber Warfare (2012)
